<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Performs a Permissions Check for the Given PCDS Account</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/config/v3/account/{id}/status"}></MethodEndpoint>



Returns details pertaining to the rudimentary permissions check - contains details pertaining to any missing permissions.

## Request

success
